item.title: Khanna takes over as head Democrat on House select committee on China
item.description: Rep. Ro Khanna is set to take over as the top Democrat on the House select committee on China.

item.title: Lawmakers reach deal on three-bill spending package, House to vote this week
item.description: The House will vote this week on a bipartisan three-bill spending package negotiated by top appropriators in both chambers.
